meanings.definition: The quality or state of being excessively enthusiastic or fervent.
meanings.sent1: Her overzealousnesses for the school play made her practice every day after school.
meanings.sent2: His overzealousnesses for the project led him to work late into the night.
meanings.sent3: The overzealousnesses of the puppy for treats was both adorable and exhausting.
meanings.sent4: The overzealousnesses of the fans reached a fever pitch as the team scored the winning goal.
meanings.sent5: The overzealousnesses of the toddler for bubbles was evident in her excited giggles.

meanings.definition: Excessive or extreme enthusiasm or eagerness.
meanings.sent1: The overzealousnesses of the crowd at the concert created a lively atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: His overzealousnesses for collecting stamps led to a room filled with albums.
meanings.sent3: The overzealousnesses of the chef for spices resulted in a dish that was too spicy to eat.
meanings.sent4: The overzealousnesses of the students for the upcoming field trip was palpable in the classroom.
meanings.sent5: Her overzealousnesses for gardening was evident in the beautifully landscaped backyard.
